entry.title: 3M 4274 - Noise, Vibration & Harshness Dampening Material black/clear, 6.8 fl. oz. (200 ml) 7100004038
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 70.35

[shortdesc]

3M Noise, Vibration & Harshness Dampening Material, 04274, black/clear, 6.8 fl. oz. (200 ml)

  • 3M™ Noise, Vibration & Harshness Dampening Material is a flexible adhesive-type material used to reduce noise and vibration between panels where a long work time is required
  • This product can be applied between roof skins and roof bows, door skins and door intrusion beams, or other areas using non-structural type foam materials, providing up to 1 inch (2.54 cm) thick layer of flexible material on vertical and overhead applications
  • It can also be applied over existing damping material as long as the original material is still integrally bonded.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Color Black, Clear
    Origin Country United States
    Volume 6.8 fl. Oz, 200 ml

    Product Information

  • 60 minute work time
  • Remains very soft, yet sturdy
  • Will not degrade
    		•

entry.title: 3M Scotch-Weld DP8010-490ML - Structural Plastic Adhesive DP8010 in Blue (490 ml) Duo-Pak 7100036719
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Structural Adhesives
Price: 333.70

[shortdesc]

3M Scotch-Weld Structural Plastic Adhesive, DP8010, blue, 490 ml duo-pak

  • 3M Scotch-Weld Structural Plastic Adhesive DP8010 is a two-part, acrylic-based adhesives (10:1 ratio by volume) that can bond many low surface energy plastics, including many grades of polypropylene, polyethylene and TPO’s without special surface preparation
  • 3M Scotch-Weld Adhesive DP8010 can replace screws, rivets, plastic welding, and two-step processes which include chemical etchants, priming or surface treatments in many applications.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch-Weld
    Color Blue
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Structural Adhesives
    Volume 16.56 fl. Oz, 490 ml

    Product Information

  • Creates strong bond on low surface energy plastics (LSE) such as polyolefin with minimal or no surface prep required
  • Formulated to bond multi-material assemblies such as LSE plastics, thermoplastics, composites, and metals
  • Medium viscosity allows controlled dispensing
  • Strong adhesive can replace screws, rivets, and welding

    • Suggested Application

  • Bonds low surface energy plastics
    		•

entry.title: 3M 8101 - Structural Adhesive 2 fl. Oz (60 ml) - 2 Tubes Per Kit 7000121313
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Structural Adhesives
Price: 43.99

[shortdesc]

3M Structural Adhesive, 08101, 2 fl. oz. (60 ml)

  • 3M™ Structural Adhesive, 08101, is a two-part general purpose structural adhesive that may be used for bonding metal, glass and plastic
  • This product can be used for trim, fibreglass and flexible body parts repair.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Structural Adhesives
    Volume 2 fl. Oz, 60 ml

    Extra Product Information

  • It is easy to mix, sets up quickly, spreads smoothly, and cures to an extremely strong bond.

    • Product Information

  • Cures quickly
  • Easy to mix
  • Spreads smoothly
  • Very high strength once cured

    • Suggested Application

  • Used to bond metal, painted metal, fibreglass, rigid plastics and other materials to themselves or each other
    		•

entry.title: 3M Scotch-Weld DP8010NS-490ML - Structural Plastic Adhesive DP8010NS in Blue (490 ml) Duo-Pak 7100036723
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Structural Adhesives
Price: 373.00

[shortdesc]

3M Scotch-Weld Structural Plastic Adhesive, DP8010NS, blue, 490 ml duo-pak

  • 3M Scotch-Weld Structural Plastic Adhesive DP8010NS is a two-part acrylic-based adhesive that can bond many low surface energy plastics
  • It has a 10:1 mix ratio, a 10 minute worklife and reaches handling strength in two hours
  • 3M Scotch-Weld Adhesive DP8010NS can replace screws, rivets, plastic welding, and two-step processes which include chemical etchants, priming or surface treatments in many applications.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch-Weld
    Color Blue
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Structural Adhesives
    Volume 16.56 fl. Oz, 490 ml

    Product Information

  • Creates strong bond on low surface energy (LSE) plastics such as polyolefin with minimal or no surface prep required
  • Delivers non-sag formulation so adhesive stays where when applied
  • Formulated to bond multi-material assemblies such as LSE plastics, thermoplastics, composites, and metals
  • Medium viscosity allows controlled dispensing
  • Strong adhesive can replace screws, rivets, and welding

    • Suggested Application

  • Bonds low surface energy plastics
    		•

entry.title: 3M 7333 - Impact Resistant Adhesive 6.8 fl. oz. (200 ml) 7100050351
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Structural Adhesives
Price: 92.65

[shortdesc]

3M Impact Resistant Adhesive, 07333, 6.8 fl. oz. (200 ml)

  • 3M™ Impact Resistant Adhesive, 07333, is a two-part epoxy adhesive which helps provide an extended work time, but can be rapidly cured with heat
  • The adhesive has excellent adhesion to a wide variety of properly prepared automotive substrates including steel and aluminum
  • It also has a feature indicating when the curing process has begun through colour change technology
  • The adhesive bead starts silver in colour and changes to purple once curing is underway
  • Cured product is purple to indicate proper mixing and complete cure.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Structural Adhesives
    Volume 6.8 fl. Oz, 200 ml

    Product Information

  • Two-part epoxy adhesive
  • Extended work time
  • Cures rapidly with heat
  • Excellent adhesion to properly prepared automotive substrates
  • Unique colour change feature indicates when curing process has begun
  • Corrosion inhibiting formula

    • Suggested Application

  • Intended for true structural bonding applications when specified by automotive OEMs, and is recommended for all weld-bonded and rivet-bonded joints
    		•
